entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
